data.title: About us
data.meta_description: DeliwiAI is a product of Decentralized Living Ltd. The company is a Finnish entity and owned by its founders and investors. Read more.ââ
data.text:
The story of DeliwiAI

In 2022, a team of successful tech entrepreneurs devised a solution that allows organizations to utilize their most important resource, their people, at a completely different level than before. ââ

The concept behind DeliwiAIâhow it addresses the real and everyday challenges of organizations âgot immediately enthusiastic feedback from customers, technology partners, and investors.ââ

Now the vision has become a reality. The Deliwi platform will be launched and will be available in the Microsoft marketplace in May 2024.

Company founders: Jani Virtanen, Aki Antman, Henri Kortelainen

DeliwiAI will revolutionize the utilization of internal resources and knowledge of organizations. Its impact and benefits are staggering for every organization.ââ

But this is only the beginning. In the future, DeliwiAI plans to do something even more revolutionary: Solve a problem that affects all companies globally: shortages and overcapacity of skilled workforce.

Aki Antman

Chairman of the board

LinkedIn

Aki has been chosen as one of the top 100 ICT influencer in Finland over 15 times. He has worked in the Microsoft ecosystem since 1993 and has a masters degree in computer science. Aki is currently the CEO of Sulava Group, the leading Finnish and UAE Microsoft cloud partner he founded back in 2010.

Jani Virtanen

CEO

LinkedIn

Jani is digital business pioneer and marketing visioner and executive. Jani has co-founded, led and exited two digital marketing companies, and worked as CEO for an international marketing agency and IT consultancy. Before joining Decentralized Living Oy, Jani worked as a strategist and investor in his own development company Hopper Advisors.

Henri Kortelainen

CFO & COO

LinkedIn

Henri has worked for the past 20 years in various software companies in Finland, Canada and Australia as a CFO, Board Member and Consultant, responsible for the financial functions, business operations and corporate governance.

Mika Prunnila

Advisor

LinkedIn

D.Sc, Professor at VTT, 20 years+ of experience in preparation, execution and leading of collaborative international and national R&D projects involving industrial and academic partners.

Tuomo Rantanen

Advisor

LinkedIn

Business advisor and investor, specialized on development of business models, finance, corporate governance and acquisitions. Over the past 15 years, Tuomo has helped hundreds of companies and entrepreneurs succeed even better.

Jani Ristola

Advisor

LinkedIn

Investor and Business Executive specialized in go-to-markets, leadership structures, tech-organization KPIâs and corporate governance. Jani has lead several business transformation and modernization programs to make people and organizations successful. He has also operated in a number of international executive and CEO roles over 20-years.

Lasse Gerdt

Advisor

LinkedIn

Lasse has 20+ years of international experience from the largest global technology companies and startups. During the last 15 years he has built and managed business and GTM strategies at Microsoft and Amazon, focusing in the EMEA cloud market and technology transformation in multiple industries. As a people leader he has been hiring and developing high performance, multi-national sales, partner and specialist teams across 20+ nationalities.
